Name: Marshmallow Melee
About the game: Steve, the Wizard has been kidnapping the Marshmallows! Rally your troops and fight your way to the top of an ever-shuffling tower to defeat him! Marshmallow Melee is an adorable rogue-lite dungeon crawler with toy-sized warriors. Game Features A toy-scaled dungeon crawler with over 70 unique “playset” levels A Shuffling Tower System that creates a different adventure every time you play Wacky weapons: hit enemies with a lolly-pop, cactus, and more! Shops where you can buy powerful new weapons . . . and PIZZA! Physically Based Rendering for ultimate Marshmallow immersion Minimal Space Requirements: Designed for front-facing standing or seated VR (“Couch Scale”)
